query:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
  system_id, system_id|| '-' || To_Char(pd, 'yyyymmddhh24mi')id,
  pd process_date, 
  Round(((PD- Lag(PD,1)OVER(ORDER BY PD))*24*60)-(CYCLE_TIME/60),1) DeadTime 
FROM
(SELECT pROCESS_DATE pd, CYCLE_TIME, system_id
FROM LR4_SHIM_ASSEMBLY
WHERE SYSTEM_ID = 'CYBOND63'
AND PROCESS_DATE > TO_DATE('2015-06-16 04:30','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
ORDER BY PROCESS_DATE)
)WHERE deadtime > 0
